analysis.description:
EDUCrowdsale.token (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#498) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#14)

Reentrancy in EDUToken.delayedTransferFrom (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#613-616):
	External calls:
	- transferFrom(_tokenWallet,_to,_value) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#614)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- kycPending (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#615)

Reentrancy in KYCToken.isKnownCustomer (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#249-255):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(! kycPending[_address] || certifier.certified(_address)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#250)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- kycPending (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#252)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#90-92) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#91)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#291-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#292)

EDUCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#520-526) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#522)
	-token.delayedTransferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#524)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#469-476) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#471)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#479-482) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#481)

EDUCrowdsale.getCurrentRate (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#529-541) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < 1529928000 (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#536-540)
	- block.timestamp < 1529323200 (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#534-540)

	- block.timestamp < 1528156799 (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/13076.sol#530-540)
